Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Amodei amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 185 (Roll no. 371).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Amodei.

description: An amendment No. 20 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit funds from being used to enforce the requirement of the Federal Election Campaign Act that solicitation of contribution from member corporations' stockholders or personnel from a trade association be separately and specifically approved by the member corporation involved prior to the solicitation, and that such member corporations does not approve any such solicitation by more than one trade association in any calendar year.
purpose: Amendment prohibits funds from being used by the FEC to enforce the prior approval requirement for trade associations.
